amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to eliminate non-defense related spending by the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 416 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 88.

action.text: Amendment SA 416 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Coburn.
